channel.title: Comments on: The only review of ‘Control’ that matters

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: reynolds is always brilliant with the pen. "rip it and start again" was infinitely more incisive and thorough than anything a legs mcneil type could've done. maybe it's the distance factor - both literal and figurative - but the melody maker set has always been more acute at judging and commenting on the various scenes over here than our own native sons...with a few exceptions.
item.content:encoded: reynolds is always brilliant with the pen. “rip it and start again” was infinitely more incisive and thorough than anything a legs mcneil type could’ve done. maybe it’s the distance factor – both literal and figurative – but the melody maker set has always been more acute at judging and commenting on the various scenes over here than our own native sons…with a few exceptions.
